sense.def:
To shrug one's shoulders
pomeni dvigniti ramena in tako pokazati, da nas nekaj ne zanima, da nečesa ne vemo ali da nam je vseeno.

seg.quote: ‘Do you mind if I wait?’ I asked. Melanie shrugged. ‘Please yourself.’
The man nodded with a faint shrug of his shoulders.

sense.def:
To shrug something off
pomeni nekaj obravnavati kot nepomembno ali nevredno pozornosti.

seg.quote: The chairman shrugs off any criticism that their methods are not legal.
